title: Understanding Option Buttons
text: Option buttons in Excel are used to provide users with a set of predefined choices. They are often used in forms or surveys to ensure that users can only select one option from a list.

title: Where to Find Option Buttons
text: In Excel, option buttons are typically found in the 'Developer' tab under 'Insert'. They are part of the form controls that you can add to your worksheet.

hintAnswer: Auto Fill Options, AutoCorrect Options, Insert Options, Paste Options, Trace Error
title: Listing Excel Option Buttons
text: Identify the different option buttons available in Excel. These buttons help users perform specific actions or provide feedback.
